short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your English with our Chrome extension! Enter words and get sentences powered by GPT-3 API. Fun, interactive and easy to use

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Word Study extension allows users to input English words and receive a list of sentences using those words as output.

The sentences are generated using the GPT-3 API, providing a diverse and engaging way for users to study and improve their English language skills.

The extension is easy to use and provides a fun and interactive way to study English words.

With its powerful sentence generation capabilities, the Word Study extension is an excellent tool for anyone looking to improve their English language skills.
